name: AlgoRealmGameManager

methods.name: initialize_game
methods.desc: Initialize the game state - called once when contract is created

methods.name: register_player
methods.desc: Register a new player in the game

methods.name: create_game_item
methods.desc: Create a new game item as an ASA

methods.name: recover_lost_item
methods.desc:
ON-DEMAND TOKENIZATION: Recover a lost game item
This is the core feature for Task 6

methods.name: seasonal_event_reissue
methods.desc:
ON-DEMAND TOKENIZATION: Reissue seasonal event items
Allows players to earn previous season items in new events

methods.name: craft_items
methods.desc:
Craft new items by combining existing ones
Demonstrates atomic transactions

methods.name: advance_season
methods.desc: Advance to next season (only game master)

methods.name: claim_item
methods.desc:
Claim an item that was created for the player.
Player must have opted-in to the asset before calling this.

methods.name: get_recovery_status
methods.desc: Get player's current recovery count and max allowed recoveries

desc:
Main game manager contract for AlgoRealm
    Handles player registration, item management, and on-demand tokenization

sourceInfo.errorMessage: OnCompletion is not one of NoOp, OptIn
Only game master can advance season
Only game master can create items
Only registered players can claim items
Only registered players can recover items
Recovery limit reached - max 3 recoveries per player
can only call when not creating
